text: The Art of Playing Mythos is a book about the Mythos, a collectible card game (CCG) published by Chaosium in 1996. ==Contents== The Art of Playing Mythos is a 160-page book written by Scott David, Aniolowski, Charlie Crank, Eric Rowe and Lynn Willis. It contains an expanded version of the game rules for the collectible card game Mythos, as well as a list of every card in the game as of the publication date of the book, a FAQ, and errata. ==Reviews== In the July 1997 edition of Dragon (Issue #237), Rick Swan thought that "serious players should ... consider investing in The Art of Playing Mythos. ==Reviews== *Arcane #10 ==References== Category:Books about collectible card games
